game.title: The Last Hope
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity's last survivors must band together to reclaim their planet from an alien invasion. Players take on the role of a leader who must make tough decisions and navigate the treacherous landscape to unite the scattered remnants of society.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player character, a young woman named Ava, waking up in a abandoned bunker deep beneath the Earth's surface. She finds a cryptic message from her sister, detailing the location of a hidden underground city where other survivors may be waiting.
game.ending: After overcoming countless obstacles and making difficult choices, Ava finally reaches the heart of the alien invasion: a massive mothership hovering above the planet. With a small band of allies by her side, she must face off against the alien commander in an epic battle to save humanity's last hope for survival.
